body_html:
The issue was caused because I initialized the one hot classes as np.array() and didnt fill a few of them with 0 or 1. And as they are randomly initialized. A few of them turned out to be nan.
Just debug your input data to the N/W.

body:
The issue was caused because I initialized the one hot classes as np.array() and didnt fill a few of them with 0 or 1. And as they are randomly initialized. A few of them turned out to be nan.
Just debug your input data to the N/W.
